All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicationContext, BeanFactory, HierarchicalBeanFactory, ListableBeanFactory, MessageSource, ThemeSource, WebApplicationContext
public class StaticWebApplicationContext
extends StaticUiApplicationContext
implements WebApplicationContext

Static WebApplicationContext implementation for testing. Not for use in production applications.
